meanings.definition: A person who specializes in creating or compiling documents.
meanings.sent1: The documentalists at the library helped organize all the paperwork.
meanings.sent2: The documentalists in the office were responsible for archiving important files.
meanings.sent3: The documentalists had a race to see who could sort papers the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The documentalists were like human filing cabinets, storing information with precision.
meanings.sent5: The documentalists meticulously arranged the documents in chronological order.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the creation or compilation of documents.
meanings.sent1: The documentalists skills were essential for maintaining accurate records.
meanings.sent2: The documentalists department was known for their attention to detail.
meanings.sent3: The documentalists party had a theme of paper and ink.
meanings.sent4: The documentalists touch turned ordinary papers into organized masterpieces.
meanings.sent5: The documentalists work was evident in the neatly stacked files.
